00009 #if !defined(Apoxi_ObjectReferrer_hpp)
00010 #define Apoxi_ObjectReferrer_hpp
00013 
00014 #include <Kernel/Types.hpp>
00015 #include <Kernel/Os/Os.hpp>
00016 #include <Kernel/Os/SemObtainer.hpp>
00017 #include <Auxiliary/Macros.hpp>
00018 
00020 class ReferableObject {
00021     public:
00023         ReferableObject(INT refcount = 0) : m_refcount(refcount) {
00024             DBG_OUT((10000, L"create referable object (%p)!", this));
00025         }
00026 
00028         virtual ~ReferableObject() { ASSERT_DEBUG(m_refcount == 0); }
00029 
00031         virtual INT RefCount() const { return m_refcount; }
00032 
00034         virtual void AddRef() const {
00035             m_refcount++;
00036             DBG_OUT((10001, L"add reference to object(%p)! ref_count = %d", this, m_refcount));
00037         }
00038 
00040         virtual void Release() const {
00041             ASSERT_DEBUG(m_refcount > 0);
00042 
00043             m_refcount--;
00044             DBG_OUT((10002, L"release reference to object(%p)! ref_count = %d", this, m_refcount));
00045 
00046             if (m_refcount == 0)
00047                 OnZeroReferrers();
00048         }
00049 
00050     protected:
00052         virtual void OnZeroReferrers() const {
00053             ASSERT_DEBUG(m_refcount == 0);
00054             DBG_OUT((10003, L"Delete ReferableObject (%p)", this));
00055 
00056             delete this;
00057         }
00058 
00059     private:
00060 
00061         //This must be mutable so that AddRef and Release can be const.
00062         //AddRef and Release must be const so that const objects can be refcounted.
00063         mutable INT m_refcount; 
00064 
00066         ReferableObject(const ReferableObject& obj);
00067 
00069         ReferableObject& operator=(const ReferableObject& obj);
00070 
00071 };
00072 
00073 /*  template<class T> class ThreadSafeReferableObject : public ReferableObject {
00074     no templates with virtual functions for target compiler */
00075 #define DefThreadSafeReferableObject(Name, SemClass)        \
00076     class Name : public ReferableObject {       \
00077         public:                                             \
00078             typedef ReferableObject Base;       \
00079                                                             \
00080             Name(INT refcount = 0) : Base(refcount) {       \
00081             }                                           \
00082                                                             \
00083             virtual INT RefCount() const {                  \
00084                 SemObtainer semob(&SemClass::m_sem);    \
00085                 return Base::RefCount();                    \
00086             }                                           \
00087                                                             \
00088             virtual void AddRef() const {                           \
00089                 SemObtainer semob(&SemClass::m_sem);    \
00090                 Base::AddRef();                             \
00091             }                                           \
00092                                                             \
00093             virtual void Release() const {                      \
00094                 SemObtainer semob(&SemClass::m_sem);    \
00095                 Base::Release();                            \
00096             }                                           \
00097     }
00098 
00099 
00100 /*  template<class T> class ObjectReferrer {
00101     no templates with virtual functions for target compiler */
00102 #define DefObjectReferrer(Name, RefClass)                   \
00103     class Name {                                            \
00104         public:                                             \
00105             Name(RefClass *ref = 0) : m_ref(0) {            \
00106                 SetReference(ref);                          \
00107             }                                           \
00108                                                             \
00109             Name(const Name &or) : m_ref(or.m_ref) {        \
00110                 if (m_ref != 0)                             \
00111                     m_ref->AddRef();                        \
00112             }                                           \
00113                                                             \
00114             virtual ~Name() {                               \
00115                 if (m_ref != 0)                             \
00116                     m_ref->Release();                       \
00117             }                                           \
00118                                                             \
00119             RefClass* GetReference() const {                \
00120                 return(m_ref);                              \
00121             }                                           \
00122                                                             \
00123             void SetReference(RefClass *ref = 0) {  \
00124                 if (m_ref != 0)                             \
00125                     m_ref->Release();                       \
00126                                                             \
00127                 m_ref = ref;                                \
00128                                                             \
00129                 if (m_ref != 0)                             \
00130                     m_ref->AddRef();                        \
00131             }                                           \
00132                                                             \
00133             virtual Name& operator=(const Name &or) {       \
00134                 SetReference(or.m_ref);                     \
00135                 return(*this);                              \
00136             }                                           \
00137                                                             \
00138             RefClass* operator->() const {                  \
00139                 return(m_ref);                              \
00140             }                                           \
00141                                                             \
00142         private:                                            \
00143             RefClass *m_ref;                                \
00144     }
